name: Rhythm Ducks
description:
Please play in fullscreen

Originally for Trijam #214 with the theme "Don't shoot!" with an Axolotl friend of mine. A small patch was released post jam.

In this cardboard carnival themed rhythm game you have to shoot the ducks, and not shoot the dogs. Simple, right? Well, the carnival lights are a bit old so don't trust them to always stay on!

Credit to Axolotl for all things sound - music, sound effects, designing rhythms.
